results.name: a(n) = sigma(n) - A079667(n).
reference: H. J. S. Smith, Report on the Theory of Numbers, reprinted in Vol. 1 of his Collected Math. Papers, Chelsea, NY, 1979, see p. 322.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} min(d, n/d). - _Seiichi Manyama_, Dec 27 2017
program: (PARI) {a(n) = sumdiv(n, d, min(d, n/d))} \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Dec 27 2017
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 15 2006
